body_html: @rusty1s @AntoinePrv and others want to discuss more about sparse please join the sparse_tensors channel at pytorch.slack.com. This can help us to figure out details of specific needs / make decisions much faster, and will help to roll out sparse features much quicker since it is more of a use case driven area at this point.

This can help us to figure out details of specific needs / make decisions much faster, and will help to roll out sparse features much quicker since it is more of a use case driven area at this point.
body: @rusty1s @AntoinePrv and others want to discuss more about sparse please join the `sparse_tensors` channel at pytorch.slack.com. This can help us to figure out details of specific needs / make decisions much faster, and will help to roll out sparse features much quicker since it is more of a use case driven area at this point.
